description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nEgg-log:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_BUFF_DEFENSIVE}. After your {RACE_Eggxotic} creatures take damage, they deal damage to the enemy equal to 10% of their {STAT_defense}. This trait does not stack.
name: Thorny Eggshell
